title: How do I re-enable ultimate skin animated profiles?
body: I used to have animated profiles with ultimate skins and it just stop being animated and just a still lately. I cannot find the setting that re-enable it. Can I bring it back?

replies.body:
This is actually a bug in the Beta Client, as *Lew* has mentioned. Since I don't work on the development team that addresses these bugs, I don't have an idea of when this may be fixed.

If you have any other questions, please don't hesitate to ask. ;D
I think its bugged in the latest patch and hopefully they can fix it soon.
